programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Pranks of Kindness and Fulfilling a Dream for an Old Friend
programme.desc: Davin hits the streets in his new tree costume and attempts to jump-scare passersby. Ryan then offers them a chance to win money by answering trivia questions. Later, Justin surprises an old friend with a rare cat she has dreamt of owning for years.

programme.title: FIXT
programme.sub-title: FIXT: New Dad Is Done Feeling Ashamed of His Smile
programme.desc: Danny’s a family man now and needs to upgrade his smile, damaged by past drug use. But he’s been burned by dentists before. Tattoo artist Craig claims that no one’s been able to give him teeth he won’t break. Will their faith in dentists be restored?

programme.title: Only In
programme.sub-title: Only In: Homemade CEOs, Recycle Bicycle & Pennsyltucky Whiskey in Harrisburg, PA
programme.desc: Where can you find young entrepreneurs, a nonprofit tune-up shop keeping the community safe and a distillery serving up the spirit of Central Pennsylvania? The same place where genius is grown and savory ice cream is a tradition.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The DNA of Murders
programme.desc: Three brutal cold cases remain unsolved for decades until advances in forensic technology bring investigators closer than ever to finding answers for the victims’ families and friends.

programme.title: Power of One
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: News 8 is following the journey of a young York County woman with a stage 4 terminal cancer diagnosis as part of our series, "Power of One".

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It, Pittsburgh!: Food Fight
programme.desc: In today's Food Fight feast, Chefs Zack Shell and Angel Magwood are heading back to school to put their spin on elevated school lunch dishes.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Massacre That Ravaged a Sleepy Suburb
programme.desc: Six people are slain in a home in a quiet Iowa town. One person survives a gunshot to the head and claims to have no memory of the incident. The tragedy and eventual trial shred the social fabric of the neighborhood.

programme.title: My Amazing Cheap Date
programme.sub-title: Cheap Date: Fried Foods and Perplexing Puppets
programme.desc: Fried chicken, beignets and a surprise laundromat puppet show on two cheap blind dates in New Orleans.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The 15-Year Fight for Justice in a Small Town Teen’s Killing
programme.desc: A teenager vanishes from her home one fall morning in 1999. Her body is discovered 17 days later, seven miles away. It takes more than 15 years for the heartbreaking truth to come out.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Ed and Day in the 'Burgh: Nailing It In Carnegie
programme.desc: Ed and Day get competitive over a round of golf and learn a new twist on old fashion cocktail making before heading to Apis Meadery in Carnegie.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.sub-title: Boston Rob Does Beantown: Chinatown Treats
programme.desc: Rob feasts on fabulous cuisine, makes more than a few new friends and joins a trampoline gym class in one of Boston's oldest neighborhoods.

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.sub-title: Free Spirit : How Art and Mixology Meet Up in Santa Fe
programme.desc: Kate explores gin and rituals with a master distiller, talks art and cocktails with an Indigenous painter, and gets a lesson in moving mixology on George R.R. Martin’s adventure train in the high-desert city of Santa Fe.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.sub-title: Stitch: Great Adventures Making the World a Better Place
programme.desc: Step out of your comfort zone, be bold and daring and challenge yourself. Through these journeys, thrill-seekers gain priceless skills and knowledge, even helping make the world a better place.

programme.title: Absolutely Albuquerque
programme.sub-title: Absolutely Albuquerque: Shaking Things Up
programme.desc: Old classics get a fun twist. Amanda hits the town with expert mixologist Kate Gerwin, who introduces her to a custom sneaker shop, a new pizza place with some unexpected ingredients, and the city’s unique lowrider scene.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Get To Know Everyone in Bay St. Louis, MS
programme.desc: In spite of recent storms, this community grows stronger and stronger. Experience the neighborly love for yourself in Bay St. Louis, Mississippi.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It, Pittsburgh!: Breakfast for Dinner
programme.desc: Chef Nissa'a Stallworth and Chef Joey Hilty test their limits as they work to put a dinner twist on the most important meal of the day.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Mom Daughter Duo Drop Into the Wild
programme.desc: The mother-daughter dynamic duo of Cher and Sabria Delaine are best friends and do almost everything together except get out into nature. So Kinga meets up with ladies to mix things up and try to blend Cher’s island life with some southern comfort.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Super Rare Stolen Treasures
programme.desc: From a 300-year-old violin valued at $6 million, to thousands of rare books, thieves will go to wild, even dangerous, lengths to snatch up irreplaceable treasures. For investigators, it's a race against the clock to recover these priceless valuables.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.sub-title: Wait, What Happened?: All In The Family
programme.desc: Frank Nicotero asks contestants about real news stories with unreal outcomes for a chance at a cash prize. In "Family Care," locals learn about a resourceful rescue, a bold family tradition and mother-son musicians.

programme.title: WGAL Local News
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Get the latest local news and weather from WGAL.

programme.title: Behind the Lens: A Storytellers Project
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Join WGAL News 8's Anne Shannon for "Behind the Lens: A Storytellers Project," where we relive the best of 2024 through the eyes of our award-winning photojournalists.

programme.title: Heroes On Call
programme.sub-title: Heroes On Call: The Forgotten Story of America's First Paramedics
programme.desc: In the 1960s, Americans were dying at shocking rates due to inadequate emergency care. Enter Freedom House Ambulance Service: the first paramedics unit in the U.S., run and staffed by Black men and women. This is the origin story of EMS.

programme.title: Unbelievable
programme.sub-title: Unbelievable: Rescues From the Brink
programme.desc: Brace yourself for heart-stopping heroics as rescuers leap into action! A semi-truck teeters dangerously over the Ohio River, a devastating gas explosion reduces homes to rubble, and a capsized cargo ship leaves its crew fighting for survival.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: One local single experiences some of the best their city has to offer on three blind dates. Our singles may spend three perfect days out on the town, but there can only be one love match. Who will be picked for a second date?

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Join New Hampshire-based band Recycled Percussion as they perform acts of kindness in their community, and across the country. In each episode, you'll witness the great lengths and hilarious things they're willing to do in the name of kindness.

programme.title: The Spark
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: From professional hockey players to award-winning muralists, The Spark highlights the craft, the journey, and the joy. These masters and thought leaders may have made names for themselves on the national stage, but they never forget the city that sparks their inspiration daily

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Chefs recreate each other’s signature dish, but they can only determine what the dish is using their senses of taste, touch and smell. When the masks come off, the heat is on, with each chef attempting to cook their opponent’s creation.

programme.title: On The Job
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Orlando expert, Brendan O'Connor, celebrates the people behind the scenes of the businesses that make Orlando a truly unique place. Join him as he rolls up his sleeves and receives hands on training while spending a day with them, On The Job.

programme.title: Maker Nation
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Maker Nation

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Makers, crafters and artists square off to create the most iconic art piece that best represents their city. From glass-blowers and chalk artists to metalsmiths and tattooers, see who Host Ashley Adams and the judges will crown the victor.

programme.title: Escaping The Blade
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Why California's sex traffickers are walking free while victims wait in fear and how organizations are fighting to protect survivors.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Step Up to the Plate in Dubuque, IA
programme.desc: Play ball and stay the night at the Field of Dreams movie site. Take the high road, or track, aboard a funicular railway, then go low when you explore local caverns. Fill up on mini donuts, and find your zen with kava.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Drake Diner Slayings
programme.desc: It's the day after Thanksgiving 1992 in Drake, Iowa, and few want to cook. Locals head to the popular Drake Diner instead. In front of a packed restaurant, an armed man shoots and kills two diner employees. Is the town as peaceful as some say?

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Ed and Day in The ‘Burgh: Spicing Things Up in Garfield
programme.desc: Ed and Day explore the local bike scene, learn to dance salsa, and get quizzed on their beer knowledge at Two Frays Brewery in Garfield.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.sub-title: Stitch: Veterans Day
programme.desc: Celebrating veterans, acknowledging their service and sacrifices

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: 24-Hour Fundraiser For Struggling Woman in Maine
programme.desc: Every little bit helps! Justin and Ryan prove how true that is by throwing a fundraiser to help a woman in Maine get to have a place to call her own.

programme.title: Power of One
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: News 8 is following the journey of a young York County woman with a stage 4 terminal cancer diagnosis as part of our series, "Power of One".

programme.title: Bringing Down The House: The Bombing of Harvey's Casino
programme.sub-title: Bringing Down The House: The Bombing of Harvey's Casino
programme.desc: In the summer of 1980, two men wheeled what looked like an IBM computer into a Lake Tahoe casino. The events that followed rocked the industry, baffled bomb technicians, and changed the lives of a criminal’s and a casino magnate’s family forever.

programme.title: Juvenile Lifers: Road to Redemption
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2019) Juvenile Lifers: Road to Redemption focuses on people who were sentenced to life in prison as juveniles. WGAL News 8's Matt Barcaro examines how these these former offenders are re-entering society and the reaction from victims' families.

programme.title: Human Race by Runner's World
programme.sub-title: Human Race By Runner’s World, Vol 3
programme.desc: Runner-in-Chief, Jeff Dengate, presents stories from around the country of runners using their sport for good.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Sweet Treats to Tickle Your Taste Buds from the Midwest
programme.desc: Sink your teeth into the Midwest's sweets. From the messy madness of puppy chow to kolaches to the infamous buckeye, enjoy the delicious confections that make the region a haven for dessert lovers.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Special Olympics Champ Boogies Through Bucketlist
programme.desc: Chris has an unstoppable spirit, despite the challenges of Down syndrome. His resilience has propelled him to extraordinary achievements, including clinching the gold in Greece. Meaghan takes him on a whirlwind of experiences tailored just for him.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: A true crime series telling the story of unfathomable crimes that have rocked American communities leaving them forever changed.
